title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1640-2.1 - Federal funds
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1640-2.1 - Federal funds

State Regulations

Section
75
of the

Public Housing Law prohibits the mingling or commingling of State moneys (i.e. loans or subsidies) allocated to a local agency with financial aid or
assistance from the Federal government or any agency thereof except, with the
approval of the commissioner, in connection with the execution of contracts
between a local agency and the Federal government for the carrying out of a

Federal program of urban renewal and/or redevelopment. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
§§
1640-2.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
